title: [Large-Scale] Learning Transfer Support Strategies Through Managerial Development Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Management Competencies and Job Experience
context.additional_context: Program supporting current practitioners in effectively transferring workplace-acquired knowledge; learners access LMS via personal devices for asynchronous learning, with summative assessments measuring outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can identify organizational learning transfer barriers and propose solutions with over 80% accuracy
Learners can develop an action plan to apply learned content to real-world tasks using a mentoring system
Learners can design and implement learning transfer strategies considering personal value systems and organizational culture
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
